resolved.title: Fix tasks-api.js delete by ID bug
resolved.description: APPROVED BY BRAIN: Fix the delete button bug. IDs regenerate on reload causing delete to fail. Use name-based fallback. Remember: 1) Backup first 2) Test with node -c 3) Restart backend after
resolved.instructions: APPROVED: Fix the delete bug. Steps: 1) Backup: cp bot-backend/tasks-api.js _backups/tasks-api.js.$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) 2) Use name-based delete fallback when ID match fails 3) Test: node -c bot-backend/tasks-api.js 4) Restart: pm2 restart bot-backend 5) Verify delete works in TasksBot UI
